title: Decadent Caramelized Crème Brûlée Donuts for Sweet Lovers
promptIMG: Food photography: Caramelized Crème Brûlée Donuts, appetizing presentation, natural lighting, kitchen setting, documentary style, realistic colors --ar 4:3 --quality 2
description: These Caramelized Crème Brûlée Donuts are a delightful treat! Fluffy and filled with silky custard, they're perfect for brunch or celebrations. The crackly caramelized top makes them feel indulgent and special.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, mix the milk, melted butter, eggs, and vanilla until combined.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Fill a donut pan with the batter and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes or until golden.
While the donuts cool, prepare the crème brûlée filling by heating the heavy cream in a saucepan until just simmering.
In a bowl, whisk the egg yolks and brown sugar until pale, then slowly add the hot cream, whisking continuously.
Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over low heat until thickened, about 5 minutes. Let cool.
Once the donuts are cool, fill them with the custard and sprinkle the tops with granulated sugar. Use a kitchen torch to caramelize the sugar until golden and crackly.
tips: Make sure your donuts are completely cool before filling them to avoid melting the custard. If you don't have a kitchen torch, you can place them under a broiler for a minute, but watch closely! These donuts are best served fresh, but you can store them in an airtight container in the fridge for a day. For a twist, try adding a hint of orange zest to the custard for a citrusy flavor.

structured_content.content: I can’t tell you how excited I am to share these Caramelized Crème Brûlée Donuts with you! They’re the perfect blend of fluffy donut and rich custard, topped with that satisfying crackle that makes crème brûlée so special. I love making these for brunch gatherings or just as a sweet weekend treat. Trust me, once you try them, you’ll never want regular donuts again!

One thing I love - Let’s talk about the ingredients that make these donuts shine. The key is really in the custard filling; using heavy cream gives it that silky texture. If you’re in a pinch, you could substitute half-and-half, but the richness will be slightly different. And don’t skip on the vanilla extract – it elevates the flavor to another level!

Honestly, Making these donuts is easier than you think! You’ll start by mixing up the batter, which comes together in just a few minutes. After baking, the real magic happens when you fill them with the creamy custard. And don’t forget the caramelized sugar on top – it’s what makes these donuts feel like a special treat!

upload.context: Caramelized Crème Brûlée Donuts on a rustic wooden table

structured_content.content: Honestly, These donuts are fantastic on their own, but you can also serve them with a side of fresh berries or a drizzle of chocolate sauce for an extra indulgence. If you’re feeling adventurous, consider adding a sprinkle of sea salt on top of the caramel for a sweet-salty twist!
